channel.title: Runescape Graphics
channel.description:
In your opinion do you think they are just god awful compared to wow, or just bad in general... Or do you think they are alright, and getting better.
Post opinions with a friendly comment (no runescape is shit, gtfo this board if you feel this way)
Read this about graphics.
[url=http://services.runescape.com/m=news/behind-the-scenes--september]http://services.runescape.com/m=news/behind-the-scenes--september[/url]
The graphics are going to get better, and better. They are getting more sources to choose how their graphics work.
Notice, they are stopping with the flat squared things (such as 317, those are horrible)
They are smoothening everything out. Full hd, ect.
Also! They had a new clothing update! Clothing now looks real, and legit, instead of plain clothing, they have like 50+ colors, and so many different options.
Post your opinions below!

item.title: Runescape Graphics
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

WoW graphics are incomparable to Runescape’s really, I find them both completely different. WoW is somewhat not a whole lot of geometry, and a fuck load of textures, and Runescape graphics are heavily improved via geometry and not a lot of textures, I mean, in 317 Runescape there was less than 50 textures used in the whole game, wonder how many were in WoW at that time?

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Graphics
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:18, topic:358376”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=454881.msg3332119#msg3332119 date=1283569335]

I’m not gonna lie, the graphics do somewhat compare to Blizzard’s.
However, if your a player from 2007 or so, then you probably prefer the older graphics.

What could RuneScape really do though?
Most of the items we’re just low quality compared to their competition, and you can’t honestly say that most gamers don’t give a shit about graphics.
They have to stay caught up or people will just forget about them and join something else.
[/quote]You kidding? RuneScape’s graphics have nothing on Blizzard’s WoW graphics. Absolutely nothing.

I don’t want this to turn out WoW vs Runescape, but wow’s weapons look cool. Other than that the landscapes are shit, as with the “spells” or attack styles. Its just like a color.[/quote]Lmao. Wow’s spells have great animations. Turn up your graphics.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Graphics
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:17, topic:358376”][quote author=revengr link=topic=454881.msg3332001#msg3332001 date=1283558128]
I’m not gonna lie, the graphics do somewhat compare to Blizzard’s.
However, if your a player from 2007 or so, then you probably prefer the older graphics.

What could RuneScape really do though?
Most of the items we’re just low quality compared to their competition, and you can’t honestly say that most gamers don’t give a shit about graphics.
They have to stay caught up or people will just forget about them and join something else.
[/quote]You kidding? RuneScape’s graphics have nothing on Blizzard’s WoW graphics. Absolutely nothing.[/quote]

I don’t want this to turn out WoW vs Runescape, but wow’s weapons look cool. Other than that the landscapes are shit, as with the “spells” or attack styles. Its just like a color.

Read full topic

I’m not gonna lie, the graphics do somewhat compare to Blizzard’s.
However, if your a player from 2007 or so, then you probably prefer the older graphics.

What could RuneScape really do though?

item.title: Runescape Graphics
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:12, topic:358376”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=454881.msg3331180#msg3331180 date=1283481953]

Why do you like the old graphics better? They are blocks. I like the old gameframe, and old weapons, but the characters/animations were just horrible. Did you like the graphics of the old Runescape, or the gameplay (free trade, ect)

Both were factors when it came to fully enjoying the game. I liked the simple, easy graphics. I don’t like the new looks of things such as scimitars and longswords. The gameplay was great, I didn’t mind the bots on most occasions and now all Jagex is focusing on is giving people weapons and items to hit extremely high, which is completely unbalancing the game in my opinion.
[/quote]

I do agree with you there, but what other choice did they have? People would have gotten bored without new weapons upon arrival. I know its ruining the triangle, but still.[/quote]
No need for such un-balancing though.

Read full topic

The gameplay was great, I didn’t mind the bots on most occasions and now all Jagex is focusing on is giving people weapons and items to hit extremely high, which is completely unbalancing the game in my opinion.[/quote]

I do agree with you there, but what other choice did they have? People would have gotten bored without new weapons upon arrival. I know its ruining the triangle, but still.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Graphics
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

the elve age:

Why do you like the old graphics better? They are blocks. I like the old gameframe, and old weapons, but the characters/animations were just horrible. Did you like the graphics of the old Runescape, or the gameplay (free trade, ect)

Both were factors when it came to fully enjoying the game. I liked the simple, easy graphics. I don’t like the new looks of things such as scimitars and longswords. The gameplay was great, I didn’t mind the bots on most occasions and now all Jagex is focusing on is giving people weapons and items to hit extremely high, which is completely unbalancing the game in my opinion.

item.title: Runescape Graphics
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:5, topic:358376”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=454881.msg3330864#msg3330864 date=1283464459]
I don’t need incredible graphics to enjoy a game. I liked the old RuneScape graphics, not this new HD shit. I am however hoping that the new update will make it easier to see D-claw rushers in the wilderness.

I like the new clothes however I don’t understand why on some outfits they have designs that look like armor you could buy/armor that looks like you’re naked.
[/quote]

Why do you like the old graphics better? They are blocks. I like the old gameframe, and old weapons, but the characters/animations were just horrible. Did you like the graphics of the old Runescape, or the gameplay (free trade, ect)

I also agree with you on the new clothing, some of it looks like clothing you can buy (guthix robes, ect)[/quote]
Gives the player a more classic feeling, you know?

Read full topic
